abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon that has δ on its card. You can't use more than 1 Delta Heal Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Espeon is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
